subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
NBA Championship
lead_paragraph: Curry, who dazzled the crowd into a state of bewilderment, finished with 40 points as the Warriors seized a three-games-to-none lead in the Western Conference finals.
snippet: Curry, who dazzled the crowd into a state of bewilderment, finished with 40 points as the Warriors seized a three-games-to-none lead in the Western Conference finals.
